Package gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.provider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HiveUnitUpdateProvider
    An interface that finds when new data was added into a Partition or a Table
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatePatternUpdateProvider
    An update provider that parses the date pattern in the Partition or Tables physical data location.
    HdfsBasedUpdateProvider
    Uses the file modification time of the data location of a HiveTable or HivePartition on HDFS
    HiveMetastoreBasedUpdateProvider
    An update provider that uses update metadata from Hive metastore
    UpdateProviderFactory
    A factory class to create HiveUnitUpdateProviders
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UpdateNotFoundException
    An exception when HiveUnitUpdateProvider can not find updates
